subject: Lisa G's Howard 100 News Preview.
body:
CDPN Moves To Corners GPS Market In China!

China Datacom Corp.
Sym: CDPN
Close: $0.065

CDPN announced Friday that is has acquired all outstanding shares of
General Link Information Systems, Chinas only GPS vehicle monitoring and
management system. GPS systems are huge; controlling that market is even
bigger. Read the news and get on CDPN first thing Monday!

Comedian Lisa Lampanelli Visits.
He had her come in a short time later and noticed what Howard was
talking about with her new look.
Howard said that Beth had gotten him a date with this chess guy who came
out to visit him over the weekend.
Howard and Artie talked about dogs for a short time and Artie was
wondering if Howard plays fetch with his lazy dog. Lisa said that they
have audio tape of Artie trying to pick up women pool side and they'll
have that on the news today. Howard said he thinks that Fred could
compete against him pretty well.
He said that dragging the kid on that show was just wrong.
Howard said he never said he could do that many.
She said Beth was telling her about how the whole chess thing had been
taking over his life like nothing before. Artie said Jon Stewart had a
lot of nice things to say about the show when he saw him down there.
Lisa said she lost 40 pounds and got a new coat and all of a sudden
she's gotten a make over.
Artie said he likes to hear that over him watching Dawson's Creek or
something like that.
Robin threw another person into the Asshole Club. Howard said he has no
control over that.
He said she said that after he spent so much time with chess. That led
to Howard playing some song parodies that Dan the Song Parody Man
created using JD's hoot sound.
Jessica Hahn And High Pitch Eric Want To Adopt A Dog.
He does work out but he doesn't challenge anyone to that.
